title: I cannot create a discussion in any other topic " level 7 error "
body: I'm level 13 yet I can't create any topics in any other areas because It says I'm not level7 on the website.

replies.body: Sometimes a new boards account needs to sync up to the boards.  The[ profile syncing tool ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool)should help!
